      Returns:

    • areAllCoordinatesFree

      private boolean areAllCoordinatesFree​(Coordinates startingPoint, Coordinates endPoint, int margin)
      Checks if all line segment coordinates are in board bounds with margins
      Parameters:
      startingPoint - starting point of generated line segment
      endPoint - end point of generated line segment
      margin - given margin
      Returns:
      true if all line segment coordinates are in board bounds with margins and false if they aren't
